>>>DOCUMENT

######################################################################

title:: Valid Subscript Markup

id:: td-000048

######################################################################

This document contains several examples of valid subscript markup.

One ,,word,, is subscript in this sentence.

,,This entire line is subscript.,,

Only ,,two words,, in this line are subscript.

This ,,paragraph,, has several ,,subscript,, words in ,,it,,.

<<<DOCUMENT
